body:
Comment 20 by **chris@altonymous.com**: 
I'm not sure how you're doing it; but the commands you are giving me aren't doing what
you say they should be doing?

$ gofmt -l=true -w=true -tabs=false -tabwidth=2 .
> Formats the files in place does not concatenate any files.

$ gofmt -l=true -w=true -tabs=false -tabwidth=2 *
> throws all kinds of errors because it tries to parse README.md, .json files..
everything.

$ gofmt -l=true -w=true -tabs=false -tabwidth=2 ./...
stat ./...: no such file or directory
